Data Fields
Dss_DispCreateStatus Struct Reference

Structure containing create status for the display driver. This should be passed as a status argument while creating the driver. More...

#include <dss_disp.h>

Data Fields

int32_t retVal
 
uint32_t standard
 
uint32_t dispWidth
 
uint32_t dispHeight
 
uint32_t minNumPrimeBuf
 

Detailed Description

Structure containing create status for the display driver. This should be passed as a status argument while creating the driver.

Field Documentation

uint32_t Dss_DispCreateStatus::dispHeight

Height of the display at the Video Port in lines

uint32_t Dss_DispCreateStatus::dispWidth

Width of the display at the Video Port in pixels

uint32_t Dss_DispCreateStatus::minNumPrimeBuf

Minimum number of buffers to prime before starting display operation

int32_t Dss_DispCreateStatus::retVal

Return status of create call

uint32_t Dss_DispCreateStatus::standard

Video Port standard like 1080p, 720p, etc. to which the video pipe is connected. For valid values see Fvid2_Standard
